Based on my research, I can now provide you with specific recommendations for using treemap and Sankey charts to visualize metadata in a data discovery context. Let me break down the types of metadata that would benefit from these visualization types:

## Metadata Types for Treemap Visualization

Treemaps are excellent for visualizing hierarchical metadata structures and proportional relationships:

1. **Data Asset Hierarchy**
   - Show how data tables/views are organized within your data warehouse or lake structure [![GitHub](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://github.com/ottogroup/schedoscope/wiki/Metascope-Primer)
   - Visualize storage allocation across databases, schemas, and tables
   - Display table sizes with nested categories (by department, domain, etc.)

2. **Metadata Classification**
   - Show data assets organized by business classification, tagging, or data governance categories [![Atlan](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://atlan.com/open-source-data-catalog-tools/)
   - Visualize personal/sensitive data distribution across systems
   - Display content by ownership or stewardship assignments

3. **Data Quality Metrics**
   - Show proportion of data assets with quality issues by category
   - Visualize completeness, accuracy, and timeliness metrics across data domains
   - Display quality issues across your data ecosystem with size indicating severity or frequency [![Datahubproject](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://datahubproject.io/)

## Metadata Types for Sankey Chart Visualization

Sankey diagrams excel at showing flows and relationships between metadata elements:

1. **Data Lineage Flows**
   - Visualize "how traffic flows from pages to other pages on your web site" [![Google](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://developers.google.com/chart/interactive/docs/gallery/sankey) or similarly how data flows through your systems
   - Show "how data flows through multi-dimensional steps" and "which elements, called nodes, contribute to the overall flow" [![Metabase](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D)](https://www.metabase.com/docs/latest/questions/visualizations/sankey)
   - Display transformation volume between source and target systems

2. **User Journey Analysis**
   - Show "customer journey as a chronological set of events" to understand paths users take through your data assets [![Towards Data Science](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&)](https://towardsdatascience.com/4-use-cases-for-sankey-charts-679b94f7c672/)
   - Visualize which data assets lead to others in discovery patterns
   - Track user flow through metadata exploration paths

3. **Metadata Relationship Networks**
   - Display "evolution between two states" of metadata like data transformations [![Data-to-viz](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&)](https://www.data-to-viz.com/graph/sankey.html)
   - Show how different data entities are connected through relationships
   - Visualize cross-reference patterns between related metadata elements

## Benefits for Users

Implementing these visualizations provides several key benefits:

1. **Improved Data Discovery**
   - Users can "quickly identify relevant data sets and attributes" through visual exploration of metadata [![LinkedIn](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://www.linkedin.com/advice/0/how-can-you-use-metadata-support-data-analytics)
   - Navigate complex relationships more intuitively than through text-based search alone

2. **Better Understanding of Data Context**
   - Visualize "relationship density and trends" to quickly grasp how data assets relate to each other [![Splunk](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D)](https://docs.splunk.com/Documentation/SankeyDiagram/1.6.0/SankeyDiagramViz/SankeyIntro)
   - See the big picture of data organization and flow within your ecosystem

3. **Enhanced Data Governance**
   - Enable "seamless end-to-end insights" into data lineage, quality, and ownership [![Opendatadiscovery](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&%3D%3D)](https://opendatadiscovery.org/)
   - Monitor metadata completeness and identify gaps in documentation

4. **Optimized Data Flow Analysis**
   - Help users "visualise a complex process and focus on a single resource in that process" to identify bottlenecks or optimization opportunities [![insightsoftware](claude-citation:/icon.png?validation=CC256B5C-BF9E-4E9D-B7BA-F4C93F57A38A&)](https://insightsoftware.com/resources/vizlib-sankey-chart-the-most-common-use-cases-examples-in-qlik-sense/)
   - Track volume and quality changes through transformation processes
